content.rendered: Juicy, tender, healthy. You can’t go wrong with this delicious product line! Our Chicken Rolls redefine what delicatessen mean and yes, we can proudly say it, as a company who over twenty years ago pioneered with original chicken recipes. Combining the European tradition with changing food trends, we have created a flavor-packed deli that’s as healthy as it is scrumptious. Try different kinds and never get bored with your next lunch box set or sandwich.
